name: One Hand #GMTKJam2019
description:
GMTK Jam 2019 game. 

This is my first game ever so please keep that in mind!! <3

Card game inspired by Slay the Spire, but you only have one hand to play.

Since you have a limited number of cards, the puzzle is knowing when to play them.

Credits:

  • edermunizz - background
  • 2ndcopy - slime sprite
  • pipoya - other monster sprites

Icons:

All from game-icons.net

  • Delapouite - Gates, Castle, Factory, Corpse, Fog, Goblin Head, Goblin Camp, Achilles Heel
  • sbed - Shield, Decrease Health
  • Lorc - Broken Shield, Run, Spiky Explosion, Metal Hand, Back Pain, Spider Web, Dagger
  • Skoll - Fist, Fangs
  • John Colburn - Gun.
  • Cark Olsen - Spider Face, Spider
